title: The Hidden fees of Crypto Payment Gateways
content:
In the world of cryptocurrency payments, the methods used to process transactions have a significant impact on both businesses and users. The standard approach that most crypto payment services use today involves generating a unique address for each payment. While this method works, it comes with several drawbacks that can affect security, convenience, and cost-efficiency.

Fortunately, there’s a better way to handle crypto payments. In this article, we’ll explore it.
